text:
Photofeeler (https://www.photofeeler.com) | Software Engineers, Marketing Roles | REMOTE or Onsite near Boulder/Denver, CO

Work for big tech, but secretly dream of being an early engineer at a startup where everything you do really matters?

Photofeeler is a tool for photo feedback, but we're primarily a data science company. We do very sophisticated math in order to maximize the statistical value of small, noisy data samples. Our company is changing the future of online profiles.

We're early into building our team but much farther into building our business. This makes us a really exciting place to work.

Our job offers unparalleled freedom without bureaucratic nonsense (think: can work remote, work flexible hours, no unnecessary meetings). Plus our users are eager and enthusiastic for everything we ship. As an early employee, you'll take part in the ongoing conversations that inform the direction of the company.

More info: https://www.photofeeler.com/jobs
